articles.title: Queen + Adam Lambert Announce 2023 North American ‘Rhapsody’ Tour Dates - Rolling Stone
articles.description: The band says they’re not even thinking about a farewell tour, and a sequel to Bohemian Rhapsody remains a possibility if they find the right script
